properties.name: Iguazu Falls (Brazil side)

properties.description: Iconic Art Deco statue atop Corcovado Mountain overlooking Rio de Janeiro

properties.name: Tijuca Forest

properties.name: Pantanal Wetlands
properties.description: World's largest tropical wetland, premier jaguar and wildlife viewing destination
